MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G72 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Lightburn Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.57am. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.50am on Monday 7th December 2020.
